Does it working with the authentic game???

Explanation for "non-working":
The game crashes if imports non-updated end-save from Arcania Gothic 4. To avoid this, simply delete the folder "%UserDocuments%\ArcaniA - Gothic 4"
This is standalone expansion, does NOT require installed Arcania Gothic 4.
The actual gameplay is not 10+ hours, but about 3-4. You may switch to max difficulty, even so you'll not have to use med. recoberies. 
Too easy, too short, too disappointing. True linear gameplay, little world, no terrain and extras for exploration. The entire Fall of Setarrif is about 10 times smaller than Arcania Gothic 4.

PS: Arcania Gothis 4 has 4 patches, as number 4 does not require any prevvious, and does not use any crack - the protection is removed by the manufacturer.
